about.title: A little bit about myself...
about.description: I started my journey into the world of programming when I was just 17 years old and I fall in love with this universe of solving problems and creating solutions through codes.

projects.landing: He4rt Developers community landing page design
projects.conf: Design for He4rtConf2021 event, authentication and tickets
projects.recap: Project to show how 2022 was for He4rt Developers
projects.4noobs: Project made for beginners to learn more about ReactJS

trainee.title: Trainee - LEB
trainee.description: I started my journey into the world of programming when I was just 17 years old and I was completely in love with this universe of solving problems and creating solutions through codes.

juniorKonoIT.title: Junior Frontend Developer - KonoIT
juniorKonoIT.description: At KonoIT, I developed a system for the healthcare area, using current best practices and technologies. My experience at KonoIT prepared me for new challenges in the market.

juniorLeb.title: Junior Frontend Developer - LEB
juniorLeb.description: At LEB, I had the opportunity to work as a developer, taking on projects and having the autonomy to implement new features and innovative solutions. With solid technical skills and creativity, I worked as a team to develop solutions that met customer demands.

rarolabs.title: Frontend Developer - RaroLabs
rarolabs.description: I had the opportunity to develop my skills in software development, where I had the challenge of creating a new system for internal use in the company in order to improve the experience of operational teams.

raroacademy.title: Teacher - Raro Academy
raroacademy.description: As an instructor at Raro Academy, I had the opportunity to share my programming expertise in React and Global State Control, including Context, Zustand and Redux. In addition to correcting exercises, I had the responsibility of structuring the course for the students, using my experience and knowledge.

seniorRarolabs.title: Senior Frontend Developer - RaroLabs
seniorRarolabs.description: I created new applications, applying good design standards and current market technologies. Demonstrating ability to deal with complex projects, I also worked on the refactoring of large systems, aiming to improve their quality and efficiency.
